badges.title: Apollo Guidance Forge
badges.description: Awarded for validating a RustChain block using a machine with equal or lesser computational power than the Apollo Guidance Computer. You went to the Moon with less than 1 MHz — and you mined RUST.

emotional_resonance.trigger: Successful PoA submission on sub-Pentium (≤ Pentium 1, ≤ 1MHz class)

badges.visual_anchor: core wire memory glowing like a star map with validator glyphs pulsing inside
